#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
main()
{
    int t;cin>>t;
   while(t!=0)
   {
       t--;
     int n;
     cin>>n;
     int p,a;a=n;
     while(a!=0)
     {
        p+=a%10;
       a=a/10;
      }
      unsigned long long int o=1;
      while(p!=0)
      {
          o*=2;p=p-1;
      }
      printf("%lld\n",o*n);
   }
}
